reviewer 1: Literature based (clinically or methodologically relevant to adjust on these variables based on the literature search conducted for this specific purpose)

decision: Age, Sex, Disease severity/disease history (ie past conditions or symptoms directly related to the disease of interest, eg history of venous thromboembolism in sickle cell disease), Performance score (ECOG PS, Karnofsky, Lansky, OMS, Ranson, ...), Comorbidities and medical history (beside pathology/disease of interest in the comparison)
